name: Wheel Runner (for PlayDate)
description:
WHEEL RUNNER

 

PlayDate's first dash-racer*, play as a rolling racer, get coins and stay alive!

This game was developped for PlayJam-2 (022), and will continue to be developed by me.  Our team has new features in the works that will be enjoyed by all our players.

PLAYJAM 2022

The development of this game happened in 72 hours in Paris and Toulon, France. The game's focus seemed clear in the beginning, but we ended up learning the hard way that physics is hard to handle in the playdate. 

We still got some good reviews, however.

And of the many things we have planned, we notably have some new levels and a brand new OST.

Wheel Runner - A Crank Exclusive. Available to play on PlayDate.

Developed by Franchovy

Music by Arthur Bussone

SFX by Swiitsh

Pixel Art by Loïs Monet and Creative Commons

Made for PlayJam 2 (hosted by PossiblyAxolotl)

* We accidentally made PlayDate's most boring infinity-runner and endless-runner as well because lack of time constraints!
